alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued February 21 at 1:45PM CST until February 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lakeshore flooding possible along Lake Superior shorelines. * WHERE...South St. Louis County near Lake Superior. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Shoreline erosion may occur. Roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
